post:
Hello!

After 5+ years, we're announcing our newest location! ***Miami!***

Almost all of the standard BuyVM goodies are also here as well! Slabs will be soon, Chia and all that.

 - Snapshots are free, but limited in count.
 - Backups are available for a cheap fee. We keep 7 ***daily*** backups.
 - IP load balancing is available in the form of ECMP. It's completely free, just contact our 
support department and we'll assign you a private ASN that you can use to peer with our route server and announce your floating IP addresses.
 - DDOS protection provided by Path.net.
 - Upload your own ISO's at any time through Stallion!
 - Free routed IPV6 /48 with every service!
 - Free Isolated private LAN's in each location!
 - Free BGP sessions with every service!
 - Free ***Directadmin***, ***Softaculous***, & ***Blesta*** licenses with all services!

---

# SLICE SLICE BABY

---

**SLICE 512**
 - **⅛ Core** @ 3.9+ GHz on a Ryzen 3900X CPU! 
 - **Fair Share** CPU Usage 
 - **512 MB** Memory 
 - **10 GB** NVME Storage 
 - **1000Mbit Unmetered** Bandwidth! 
 - **1** IPv4 Address 
 
**$2.00**/month - [**Las Vegas**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1439) / [**New York**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1440) / [**Luxembourg**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1441) / [**Miami**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1500)

**SLICE 1024**
 - **¼ Core** @ 3.9+ GHz on a Ryzen 3900X CPU! 
 - **Fair Share** CPU Usage 
 - **1024 MB** Memory 
 - **20 GB** NVME Storage 
 - **1000Mbit Unmetered** Bandwidth! 
 - **1** IPv4 Address 
 
**$3.50**/month - [**Las Vegas**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1411) / [**New York**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1413) / [**Luxembourg**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1423) / [**Miami**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1501)
  
 **SLICE 2048**
 - **½ Core** @ 3.9+ GHz on a Ryzen 3900X CPU!
 - **Fair Share** CPU Usage
 - **2048 MB** Memory
 - **40 GB** NVME Storage
 - **1000Mbit Unmetered** Bandwidth! 
 - **1** IPv4 Address
 
 **$7.00**/month - [**Las Vegas**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1402) / [**New York**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1414) / [**Luxembourg**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1424) / [**Miami**](https://my.frantech.ca/cart.php?a=add&pid=1502)
  
Thanks for the interest!
 
Francisco
